evt-001.title: Urban Gardening Workshop
evt-001.description: Learn the basics of setting up your own urban garden on a balcony or small space.

prod-001.title: Organic Basil Grow Kit
prod-001.description: Everything you need to grow fresh basil at home. Includes pot, soil, and seeds.

wk-001.title: Sustainable Composting Masterclass
wk-001.description: Deep dive into composting techniques for apartment dwellers.

prod-002.title: Heirloom Tomato Seeds
prod-002.description: Rare variety of tomato seeds, perfect for summer harvesting.

evt-002.title: Eco-Friendly Market Day
evt-002.description: Join us for a day of local produce and sustainable goods.

prod-003.title: Bamboo Garden Tool Set
prod-003.description: Essential gardening tools made from sustainable bamboo and recycled steel.

prod-004.title: Vertical Wall Planter
prod-004.description: Maximize your small space with this modular vertical planting system.

prod-005.title: Organic Vegetable Seeds
prod-005.description: Premium collection of organic vegetable seeds for your garden. Includes tomatoes, peppers, lettuce, and more.

prod-006.title: Ceramic Self-Watering Pot
prod-006.description: Stylish pot that takes care of watering for you. Perfect for busy plant parents.

prod-007.title: Solitary Bee Hotel
prod-007.description: Provide a safe nesting place for solitary bees and improve your garden's pollination.

prod-008.title: Oyster Mushroom Grow Kit
prod-008.description: Grow delicious gourmet mushrooms on your kitchen counter in just 10 days.

prod-009.title: Rainwater Collection Barrel
prod-009.description: Collect and store rainwater for your garden with this compact 50L barrel.

prod-010.title: Reusable Produce Bags
prod-010.description: Set of 5 organic cotton mesh bags for plastic-free grocery shopping.

prod-011.title: Heirloom Carrot Seeds
prod-011.description: Sweet and colorful mix of purple, yellow, and orange carrot seeds.

prod-012.title: Gardening Gloves
prod-012.description: Durable and breathable gloves made from recycled materials.

wk-002.title: Hydroponics for Beginners
wk-002.description: Learn how to grow plants without soil. Perfect for indoor urban farming.

wk-003.title: Urban Beekeeping 101
wk-003.description: Introduction to keeping bees in the city. Safety, hives, and honey harvesting.

wk-004.title: DIY Natural Pest Control
wk-004.description: Protect your plants without harmful chemicals using natural remedies.

wk-005.title: Microgreens Masterclass
wk-005.description: Grow nutrient-packed microgreens on your windowsill year-round.

wk-006.title: Permaculture Principles
wk-006.description: Designing sustainable systems that mimic nature for your home and garden.

wk-007.title: Seed Saving Techniques
wk-007.description: Preserve biodiversity by learning how to harvest and store seeds properly.

wk-008.title: Container Gardening
wk-008.description: Strategies for growing abundance in pots, hanging baskets, and small boxes.

wk-009.title: Fermentation Basics
wk-009.description: Turn your garden harvest into probiotic-rich foods like sauerkraut and kimchi.

wk-010.title: Medicinal Herbs Strategy
wk-010.description: Growing and using healing herbs from your own garden.

wk-011.title: Soil Health & Regeneration
wk-011.description: Understand the microbial life in your soil and how to nurture it.

evt-003.title: Spring Seed Swap
evt-003.description: Bring your excess seeds and trade them with neighbors. Free event!

evt-004.title: Community Garden Cleanup
evt-004.description: Volunteer to help prepare our shared spaces for the growing season.

evt-005.title: Sustainability Fair 2026
evt-005.description: Exhibitors, speakers, and demonstrations on living a greener life.

evt-006.title: Farm-to-Table Dinner
evt-006.description: A 4-course meal prepared by local chefs using ingredients grown within 10 miles.

evt-007.title: Urban Harvest Festival
evt-007.description: Celebrate the end of the season with music, food, and games.

evt-008.title: Green City Architecture Tour
evt-008.description: Walking tour highlighting the city's most sustainable buildings and rooftops.

evt-009.title: Kids Nature Scavenger Hunt
evt-009.description: Fun interactive activity for children to learn about local flora and fauna.

evt-010.title: Local Farmers Meet & Greet
evt-010.description: Get to know the people who grow your food. Q&A and networking.

evt-011.title: Rooftop Garden Open Day
evt-011.description: Exclusive access to 5 private rooftop gardens usually closed to the public.

evt-012.title: Winter Planning Symposium
evt-012.description: Prepare your garden for the cold months and plan for next spring.
